name: Yondaime
intro: The Konoha Village’s youngest Hokage who sacrificed himself to protect the village. ;Swift and vivacious, he has the ability to do a lot of physical damage.

name: Naruto
intro: The forever foot-dragger in his class, with Will of Fire burning, dreams to be a Hokage. ;As the core fighter in his team, his abilities of attack, defense and control are well balanced.

name: Sasuke
intro: A descendant of the Uchiha clan who possess Sharingan, consumed by hatred. ;Has the ability to do magic damage at a terrifying range.

name: Sakura
intro: Beneath incredible and mysterious power and a brutish exterior, a delicate girl’s heart is hidden within. ;Can heal and silence groups of targets. She serves as a team’s powerful backup.

name: Kakashi
intro: A pervert who likes to read Icha Icha Paradise and look for all kinds of excuses to explain why he’s late. ;Has incredible control ability and can do a decent amount of magic damage.

name: Zabuza
intro: A Missing-nin who once failed in assassinating Mizukage, master in Suiton techniques. ;He usually serves as a front human shield as his techniques can protect the whole team very well.

name: Lee
intro: Scattering tears with sweat, training hard every day everywhere, ;he’s a very reliable human shield who earned no fame until a late age.

name: Hinata
intro: Move forward in a straight line! I can do it, it’s my Ninjutsu. ;She takes the front on the battlefield as his technique can rebound damage. When his Chakra is full, his Sōshikens can cause incredible damage.

name: Gaara
intro: The youngest Kazekage, also a naughty boy who loves to play with sand. ;He possesses high defense and technique damage in a large area, and can serve as a human shield.

name: Jiraiya
intro: Actually I’m an author ;With pretty good multi-attack and mighty attributes, I’m the core of my team.

name: Orochimaru
intro: The study madman in Shinobi World, interested in research and study on Ninjutsu. ;He’s plays an important role in his team because of his constant high attack strength.

name: Itachi
intro: Bearing a cruel destiny, he’s a double agent serving his village and Uchiha clan, ;with very high technique damage and strong control ability.

name: Tsunade
intro: A babysitter according to both her appearance and technique, ;serving as a fine human shield with skills to regain HP.

name: Kimimaro
intro: A weirdo fond of playing with his own bones. ;With great physical defense, his technique can dizzy enemies in a large area.

name: Sasori
intro: A talented puppet master who transformed himself into a puppet to pursue the eternal art. ;The puppet can greatly weaken enemies.

name: Tobi
intro: A mystical person, modest about his real strength and pretending to be silly and naïve. ;With great attack power, he’s perfect to be positioned in the back.

name: Killer B
intro: A real idiot who likes to rap during fights. ;With terrifying physical output power, his Lightning Fist can aim at three targets at one time.

name: Iruka
intro: Inherited Will of Fire, ;he owns very common strength but can strengthen the whole team.

name: Haku
intro: Close friend of Zabuza’s, Descendant of Yuki Clan. ;His technique attack can cause massive damage, especially his Ice Spears which can result in certain death on one target.

name: Shikamaru
intro: A genius with an IQ of 200. ;A silly looking supportive character, serving as a Chakra supplier to his teammates.

name: Chouji
intro: Originally studied in Class 10, he’s a real foodie. Carrying brute force but slow-moving, ;his thick fat and rough skin are his best weapons.

name: Neji
intro: Inherited esoteric Ninjutsu of Hyuga Clan, he graduated from the academy as the number 1 best student. ;With strong defense and close combat strength, he can restrict opponents’ technique attacks.

name: Aburame
intro: Breeding many bugs in his body, he hasn’t taken bath for many years. ; A unique assist that can absorb enemies’ energy.

name: Kankuro
intro: Gaara’s brother, short tempered and impetuous, good at Kugutsu no Jutsu. His Kugutsu no Jutsu can cause dramatic damage and weaken rivals’ abilities.

name: Tenten
intro: A cutter master with various sorts of cutters, nobody knows where he hides all his darts.;Can cause great physical damage to all enemies.

name: Temari
intro: Carrying the Ninja tool Bashosen around all the time, her Wind Release technique can cause damage in a large area and grasp opportunity for her team. ;One fan of Bashosen blows a blast of sand. Three fans of Bashosen will vanish a person.

name: Kiba Inuzuka
intro: As the successor of Inuzuka Clan, he likes to take dogs for a walk and set them free to bite people. ;With outstanding attack speed, he can cause great physical damage to a single opponent.

name: Yakushi Kabuto
intro: From a big admirer and follower of Orochimaru to a stronger Ninja, ;this important character has great attack ability and survival.

name: Kisame
intro: A real man who’d sacrifice his own life to secure information. ;Technique oriented characters can’t hurt him as he absorbs technique damage.

name: Sai
intro: Retaining an interest in drawing, he’s called Magic Brush Sai. ;Chōjū Giga can deal real damage and ignore technique and physical immunity.

name: Deidara
intro: Conducting self-destruction pretty often, it’s hard to understand how he’s still alive. ;A good suicide bomber that can destroy enemies at the same time.

name: Hidan
intro: With Eternal Life, ;he’s a human shield character who’s perfect for self-abuse.

name: Kakuzu
intro: Greedy, with six hearts and high technique damage. ;he has great tolerance of physical damage, which earned him fame of immortality.

name: Suigetsu
intro: Settling in Kirigakure, Hozuki Clan members possess Suiton techniques which can convert their own body into liquefied form. ;Afraid not of physical attack but technique attack.

name: Karin
intro: A member of Taka Team, born with strong healing and sensing ability. ;Sacrifices the caster to heal allies. Strong Assist.

name: Konan
intro: The only female member in Akatsuki, expert in Paper Folding related Ninjutsu. ;Has high explosive technique. Deals last hit when killed.

name: Madara
intro: Descendant of Sage of the Six Paths, he inherited his father’s eyes and powerful chakra and spiritual energy. ;Demonstrating great talent towards anything he applied his mind to, he’s a really scary character.

name: Pain
intro: The dummy of Nagato, who was implanted with Rinnegan. ;A strong character that can break enemies’ formation.

name: Ino
intro: A member of Team Asuma, childhood friend of Sakura Haruno. ;As a supporting character, she’s able to heal as well as weaken and control rivals.

name: Gai
intro: With Taijutsu of Rock Lee and hair style of Might Guy, ;he’s a typical violent Taijutsu character who has great physical damage.

name: Hiruzen Sarutobi
intro: The 3rd Hokage, hailed as a God of Shinobi, ;has the most powerful summon Enma; extremely helpful on the battlefield.

name: Konohamaru
intro: A very talented youngster with high technique damage and battle skills, ;future of the village with the eventual dream of becoming the 7th Hokage.

name: Ōnoki
intro: He is old but strong, specialises in Tudun Ninjutsu. He is more on assist by weakening enemies and buff team mates.

name: Ay
intro: He is son of Raikage. He has temperament issue and high speed. He is a tanker and high damage output.

name: Mei Terumī
intro: She is an unmarried beautiful woman. Able to deal high damage and weaken enemies.

name: Senju Tobirama
intro: A creator of Konoha who is good at creating Ninjutsu. ; He is good at attack as well as defense and can attack enemies in the rear line.

name: Danzō
intro: The heartless and cruel man is the leader of Anbu. ;He is a good assist that can change the situation with crowd controls.

name: Hanzō
intro: Hanzō was a legendary shinobi, and the leader of Amegakure during his lifetime.

name: Uzumaki Kushina
intro: Uzumaki Kushina She was the second jinchūriki of the Nine-Tails and the mother of Naruto

name: RaiKage Sandaime
intro: Possess the strongest spear and shield, Raikage Sandame is able to crush ten thousand ninja alone. He also owns a team of high imput tanker.

name: Sena
intro: Kazekage Yondaime, he is responsible for the Suna Kagemura Saga and he possess higher damage output.

name: Jūgo
intro: A member of Taka Team who is usually gentle, but he has high murder tendency when he’s mad. A powerful tanker who born with power of cursed seal.

name: Gengetsu Hōzuki
intro: Second Mizukage in Kirigakure,  Mizu no Kuni. He is a humor and easy going person; strong in rear spell and has high spell attack.

name: Senju Hashirama
intro: Known as God of Shinobi, he founded Konohagakure and became the First Hokage.

name: Asuma
intro: Konoha Elite, possesses a rare Wind Chakra.The attack is fast and fierce, good at breaking defense

name: Black Zetsu
intro: Zetsu is created by Kaguya Otsutsuki. Black Zetsu is a back-row support Ninja,  the ability to withstand frontal damage is not high, but the control and output are strong.

name: 6P-Obito
intro: 6P-Obito is midddle row ninja, attack all enemies with high power.

name: Tayuya
intro: A member of Sound 5, specialises in summoning & genjutsu. Middle row ninja, with strong control ability.

name: Mu
intro: A wise man known for conspiracy and politics, is good at developing ninjutsu. Back-row ninja, strong in poutput and support.

name: Shisui
intro: A genius from Uchiha clan, specialized in Genjutsu and Shunshin no jutsu. Shisui is a back row physical character and is able to control a target for long period of time.

name: Yamato
intro: Elite Anbu member, possesses kekkai genkai Mukoton, superb at building houses.; Yamato is back row ninja, His mokuton can protect himself and limit enemies.

name: Darui
intro: Brave 5th Raikage, posseses kekkai genkai Ranton.; Front row tanker.

name: Kurenai
intro: Gifted Genjutsu user, Kurenai is a middle row ninja, specialised in using Genjutsu to control enemies or evade damage.

name: Nohara Rin
intro: Sanbi Jinchuriki, a gentle and kind medical ninja. A backrow healer roler with decent Chakra DMG.

name: Nagato
intro: Resurrected by Obito,Nagato posesses Rinnegan and is able to cause massive Chakra Dmg.

name: Chiyo
intro: A famed pupeteer from Sunagakure, possess strong abilities despite her appearance. Backrow control and phy atk character.

name: Yagura
intro: Yagura is the fourth Mizukage, Isobu Jinchuuriki.; Yagura is a front row ninja and Isobu's chakra can support teammates.

name: Chojuro
intro: Chojuro is the 6th Mizukage, has a shy personality but possess great power. Chojuro is a front row hero with high PHY and Chakra DMG.

name: 6P-Madara
intro: As the jinchuuki of Jubi, 6P-Madara is akin to Rikudo Sennin. He is a front row character, specializing in wide area DMG and control.

name: Toneri
intro: Toneri a blood relative of Otsutsuki Hagoromo and a descendent of the Otsutsuki clan. Possess tremendous power after awakening Tenseigan.

name: Kurotsuchi
intro: Fourth Tsuchikage，Kuotsuchi possess strong PHY DEF，is a front row ninja.

name: Guren
intro: A member of the Otokagure, Guren is a mid-row hero. Her crystal shield can protect teammates and limit enemies.

name: Sage Jiraiya
intro: Ultimate form after Jiraiya fused with the 2 toad Sages. Jiraiya's powers increase tremendously in his sage mode.

name: Hokage Kakashi
intro: Kakashi's ultimate form, fully unleashing the power of Kamui's Dimension, able to control enemies effectively.

name: Shimon Gai
intro: Gai's ultimate form. Phy Atk is greatly enhanced along with high Def.

name: Kinkaku
intro: A veteran elite of the Kumogakure，wields the treasured tools of Sage of the Six Paths. Mid-row character with different powerful weapons.

name: Susanoo Itachi
intro: Itachi at his peak, possess full Susanoo. Back row character, his Susanoo and Genjutsu are deadly weapons.

name: Young Tsunade
intro: Tsunade during the 2nd Ninja World War; extremely active as one of the legendary Sannin. Young Tsunade possess stronger physical strength and healing ability; front-row hero.

name: Rinnegan Sasuke
intro: Perfect fusion of Tailed Beast and Susanoo power. Rinnegan Sasuke is a backrow ninja, skilled at breaking through opponent's defenses.

name: 6P Naruto
intro: Naruto's new mode after obtaining all Tailed Beasts and a half of power from Hagoromo.;In this mode, all ninjutsu are boosted and can resist DEBUFFs.

name: Sage Minato
intro: Minato's ultimate form. He's able to seal enemies' ninjutsu through Shinigami's power.

name: Rinnegan Sasuke
intro: Perfect fusion of Tailed Beast and Susanoo power. Rinnegan Sasuke is a backrow ninja, skilled at breaking through opponent's defenses.

name: Ashura
intro: Ashura is the second son of the Sage of the Six Paths, inheriting the Sage's teachings. Ashura is a front-row ninja who can effectively withstand damage and possesses healing abilities.

name: Shukaku Gaara
intro: Gaara's ultimate form， with high DEF. Shukaku Gaara is a backrow ninja with both offensive and supportive abilities.

name: Indra
intro: The eldest son of the Sage of the Six Paths， born with the Rinnegan. Indra is a backrow ninja with formidable chakra damage， but he is not skilled in supporting teammates.

name: Byakugo Sakura
intro: One of Konoha's new sannin， Sakura's ultimate form during her battle against Kaguya. Possesses extremely powerful healing abilities.

name: Konoha Student
intro: School peer, beginner in Sakura Fubuki.

name: Konoha Student
intro: School peer, beginner in Sakura Fubuki.

name: Konoha Chunin
intro: A Chunin Ninja from Konoha, strong at Taijutsu.

name: Konoha Chunin

name: Kunoichi
intro: A female Ninja with a perfect body, good at Heart - Tensei.

intro: Offspring of Gama Sennin, immune to Chakra damage and techniques.

name: Anbu
intro: A mystical clan in Konoha, all its members are above Jonin level and proficient at Blast Formation.

name: 1 Tail Shukaku
intro: Tanuki monster created by anger in desert

name: 2 Tails Matatabi
intro: Black cat demon. The pet of death likes nothing more than absorbing souls.

intro: A shark beast, resident in the deep sea, lives on boats and ship crews.

name: 4 Tails Son Gokū
intro: A huge gorilla who can control the lava, good at Yōton.
